welcome.title: Welcome to Nala Pustaka
welcome.subtitle: Digital platform for preservation and analysis of ancient Archipelago manuscripts using AI technology.
welcome.selectPrompt: Select a manuscript on the left to start

step1.title: Select Manuscript
step1.description: Browse the manuscript list on the left panel. Use search or filters to find manuscripts of interest.

step2.title: Choose Analysis Mode
step2.description: Use AI Chat to ask questions, Knowledge Graph for visualization, or Educational Mode for structured learning.

step3.title: Gain Insights
step3.description: Discover deep insights, historical context, and relationships between elements in ancient manuscripts.

ragChat.title: Chat All Manuscripts
ragChat.greeting: Hello! I'm Nala, your AI assistant. Feel free to ask anything about our manuscript collection.
ragChat.welcomeDesc: Ask questions covering the entire manuscript collection. I will seek answers from multiple sources simultaneously.

examples.ex1: What are common themes in these manuscripts?
examples.ex2: How is the concept of leadership depicted?
examples.ex3: Mention main characters that appear frequently.
examples.ex4: What are the differences in language style between manuscripts?
examples.ex5: Explain the historical context of this collection.

ragChat.tips: Tip: Specific questions yield more accurate results.

chat.title: AI Chat
chat.greeting: Hello! I'm ready to help you explore the manuscript "{{title}}".

examples.theme: What is the main theme of this manuscript?

chat.tips: AI answers based on original manuscript content.

knowledgeGraph.title: Knowledge Graph
knowledgeGraph.noDataDesc: No graph data yet for this manuscript.
knowledgeGraph.tips: Drag nodes to arrange, scroll to zoom.
